description:
Stable enough to stand in, the Lure 11.5 V2 combines the performance of a recreational kayak with the comfort of a sit-on-top. With a seat that raises to sit like a chair, you have an ideal craft for paddlers who feel confined in a traditional kayak. A slightly longer design improves tracking when you hear about a hot spot.

  • Stable hull manoeuvres and tracks well, and allows standing or a high seated position
  • Adjustable Gravity Seat has 4settings, with 25cm of travel between the highest and lowest
  • Electronics and Sonar Pod makes it easy to set up your GPS, fish finder and transducer
  • UniTrack accessory rails offer unlimited outfitting configurations
  • Large hatch at the bow keeps gear dry, with a hinged hatch cover
  • Large storage well on stern deck, with bungee cords to secure bulky gear
  • Moulded grab handles on bow, stern and sides for easy handling on land
  • 2 flush-mounted rod holders with rod leash
  • Wheel in the keel allows wheelbarrow-style rolling
  • Beaver Tail rudder ready (sold separately)
  • Adjustable foot rests
name: Feelfree Lure 11.5 V2 SOT Kayak
